{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Thomson |model=SpeedTouch 716v5 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=08/2005 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC4M32B2 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325MA2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=Administrator |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.speedtouchturkiye.com/destek/ST716v5/install/ST716v5_setup_en.pdf Manual]
There is a BCM6341 on-board to handle VoIP.
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=5696&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=45 Internal images on the DD-WRT forums]
The default SSID is probably '''SpeedTouchXXXXXX''', where '''XXXXXX''' is probably some combination hex digits (probably upper case letters).
